verses.name: 2 Kings 14:21
verses.text: And all the people of Judah took Azariah, which was sixteen years old, and made him king instead of his father Amaziah.

verses.name: 2 Kings 14:22
verses.text: He built Elath, and restored it to Judah, after that the king slept with his fathers.

verses.name: 2 Kings 14:23
verses.text: In the fifteenth year of Amaziah the son of Joash king of Judah Jeroboam the son of Joash king of Israel began to reign in Samaria, and reigned forty and one years.
